replies.msg:
塞鐵中諗出來的，悼念梓樂同彥霖

小弟英文麻麻but 應該好過班毅進
有咩grammars 錯，生字錯請指出更正

Dear mum


You think you are super hero
But We think you are just zero
Nothing you did is human do so

What we want is our tomorrow
But you show us the unbelievable
You perform us a show by solo

Nine nine nine
Please pick up the line
You laugh us from the high
We cry and fight until midnight

Nine nine nine
Bleeding along the train line
I don’t know why
You just sit in the sidelines

She wishes to be Chanel Coco
Now she subsists in our memo
And told me she feels so cold

Maybe he wishes to go to Mexico
22 years he loses in total
This is the end which is irreversible

You drink your cocktail in SOHO
We make yours cocktails in Tai Po
To whom we called Popo

Nine nine nine
She forever loses her sight
What we can do is just sigh
You play Facebook and click like

Nine nine nine
They are telling lies
Are you really blind?
Evils is living in your mind

Turn on red light
Start the fight
We promise the best we try
Winning in fight




Thanks and regards
Chris Wong


LIBERATE HK
THE REVOLUTION OF OUR TIME!!!!!
